plot: A daring and violent female detective investigates a case of white slavery. In order to solve the case, she must infiltrate a bordello and pretend she's a prostitute, naturally being unable to say no to any customer, for authenticity's sake.
title: Dirty Shary
plot_es: A daring and violent female detective investigates a case of white slavery. In order to solve the case, she must infiltrate a bordello and pretend she's a prostitute, naturally being unable to say no to any customer, for authenticity's sake.
plot_en: A daring and violent female detective investigates a case of white slavery. In order to solve the case, she must infiltrate a bordello and pretend she's a prostitute, naturally being unable to say no to any customer, for authenticity's sake.
